alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 8:38PM CDT until September 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...NORTHWESTERN LIPSCOMB... NORTHEASTERN HANSFORD AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 838 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Waka to near Booker to 8 miles east of Elmwood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Booker, Darrouzett, Hardesty, Elmwood, Bryans Corner, Farnsworth, Waka, and Balko. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
